TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit OperatingSystem extends System.Object implements class System.ICloneable, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public NotInheritable Class OperatingSystem Implements ICloneable, ISerializable
public ref class OperatingSystem sealed : ICloneable, System::Runtime::Serialization::ISerializable

summary.span: 表示作業系統的資訊，例如版本和平台識別項。

span.span: Represents information about an operating system, such as the version and platform identifier.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別包含作業系統的相關資訊。The class contains information about an operating system. 針對目前的執行階段作業系統的相關資訊，擷取所傳回物件屬性。For information about the current runtime operating system, retrieve the object returned by the property. 如需 Windows 作業系統版本和其對應的版本號碼所傳回和屬性和方法，請參閱[Operating System Version](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms724832.aspx)上 Windows 開發人員置中。For a list of Windows operating system versions and their corresponding version numbers returned by the and properties and the method, see [Operating System Version](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms724832.aspx) on the Windows Dev Center. 根據設計，類別不是一般用途來描述作業系統，且您不能衍生更廣的型別從類別。By design, the class is not a general purpose means of describing an operating system, and you cannot derive a more inclusive type from the class. 如果您需要包含作業系統的其他資訊的型別，建立您自己的型別，則在包含類型的欄位和任何其他欄位、 屬性或您所需要的方法。If you need a type to contain other information about an operating system, create your own type, then include a field of type and any additional fields, properties, or methods that you require. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用物件，以顯示執行階段作業系統的相關資訊。The following code example uses the object to display information about the runtime operating system. [!code-csharp[System.Environment.OSVersion#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.environment.osversion/cs/osinfo1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Environment.OSVersion#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.environment.osversion/vb/osinfo1.vb#1)]

param.name: platform
param.span: 其中一個 值，表示作業系統平台。

span.span: One of the values that indicates the operating system platform.

param.name: version
param.span: 物件，表示作業系統的版本。

span.span: A object that indicates the version of the operating system.

summary.span: 使用指定的平台識別項值和版本物件，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, using the specified platform identifier value and version object.
is .
is not a enumeration value.

para.span: 如果您使用類別來擷取執行階段作業系統的相關資訊，您不應該呼叫這個建構函式來具現化物件。

span.span: If you are using the class to retrieve information about the runtime operating system, you should not call this constructor to instantiate an object.

para.span: 相反地，您可以擷取物件，描述作業系統從屬性。

span.span: Instead, you can retrieve an object that describes the operating system from the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ServicePack As String
public: property System::String ^ ServicePack { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得這個 物件所代表的 Service Pack 版本。

span.span: Gets the service pack version represented by this object.

value.span: 如果支援並至少安裝一個 Service Pack，則為 Service Pack 版本，否則為空字串 ("")。

span.span: The service pack version, if service packs are supported and at least one is installed; otherwise, an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks Service pack 用來散佈軟體更新安裝所在的作業系統。A service pack is used to distribute software updates for the operating system on which it is installed. 不過，並非每個作業系統使用的 service pack。However, not every operating system uses service packs. Service pack 版本中，如果有的話，是否已正確地格式化顯示。The service pack version, if available, is already correctly formatted for display. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範屬性。The following code example demonstrates the property. [!code-cpp[OperatingSystem.ServicePack#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/OperatingSystem.ServicePack/CPP/sp.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[OperatingSystem.ServicePack#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/OperatingSystem.ServicePack/CS/sp.cs#1)] [!code-vb[OperatingSystem.ServicePack#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/OperatingSystem.ServicePack/VB/sp.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得識別作業系統的 物件。

span.span: Gets a object that identifies the operating system.

value.span: 物件，描述作業系統的主要版本、次要版本、組建和修訂編號。

span.span: A object that describes the major version, minor version, build, and revision numbers for the operating system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請參閱[Operating System Version](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms724832.aspx) Windows 開發人員中心的 Windows 作業系統版本和其對應的版本號碼的清單。See [Operating System Version](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms724832.aspx) on the Windows Dev Center for a list of Windows operating system versions and their corresponding version numbers. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立數個物件並顯示每個屬性。The following code example creates several objects and displays the property for each. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property VersionString As String
public: property System::String ^ VersionString { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得目前安裝於作業系統上之平台識別項、版本和 Service Pack 的串連字串表示。

span.span: Gets the concatenated string representation of the platform identifier, version, and service pack that are currently installed on the operating system.

value.span: 、 和 屬性所傳回之值的字串表示。

span.span: The string representation of the values returned by the , , and properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，傳回的值所傳回的值相同方法。By default, the value returned by is the same as the value returned by the method. 不過，針對不同的平台的.NET framework 實作可能會傳回更適當的字串，該平台。However, an implementation of the .NET Framework for a different platform might return a more appropriate string for that platform. 請參閱[Operating System Version](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms724832.aspx) Windows 開發人員中心的 Windows 作業系統版本和其對應的版本號碼的清單。See [Operating System Version](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms724832.aspx) on the Windows Dev Center for a list of Windows operating system versions and their corresponding version numbers. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範屬性。The following code example demonstrates the property.
